thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Modern Hotel
thread.title_full: Modern Hotel - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: JAHDublin
title: Modern Hotel
text:
Stayed here on business for 2 nights. Good selection of restaurants and pubs are close by with easy access to Old Street Tube Station.
No room service. That includes delivering an iron. You have to pick it up at reception. I thought it was odd they wouldn't deliver the iron to the room. I think it depends on who is on reception as the Manager dropped it up the night before.
Not cheap at Â£210 per night.
